QuestionType.Name: YesNo
QuestionType.Description: Answer is yes or no statement.

QuestionType.Name: MultipleChoice
QuestionType.Description: Answer is chosen from a number of offered solutions.

QuestionType.Name: MathExpression
QuestionType.Description: Answer is a valid mathematical expression.

QuestionType.Name: Essay
QuestionType.Description: Answer is a text in a few sentences and provides a thorough and meaningful response.

QuestionType.Name: Code
QuestionType.Description: Answer is a programming/scripting language code.
